topic: EDAP to Present at Jefferies Global Healthcare Conference in London

ideas.title: Jefferies or Jaffa Cakes?
ideas.premise: A panelist at the Jefferies conference, clearly jet-lagged, addresses the audience saying, "Right then, let's discuss... Jaffa Cakes! I mean, EDAP."
ideas.why_funny: Plays on a common London treat and the presenter's confusion.

ideas.title: AI Judges EDAP
ideas.premise: A panelist at the Jefferies conference is visibly sweating as a courtroom sketch artist, revealed to be an AI, draws a unflattering caricature based on Getty images.
ideas.why_funny: References the AI lawsuit with Getty images and adds anxiety.

ideas.title: Gopi's Portfolio
ideas.premise: St. Peter at the pearly gates reviews Gopichand Hinduja's portfolio, impressed, and says 'Excellent! Healthcare, tech... but no dodgy parking tickets in Westminster, I hope?'
ideas.why_funny: References Hinduja's success but adds a cheeky London-specific detail.

ideas.title: NHS vs. EDAP: The Face-Off
ideas.premise: Two boxers, one labeled 'NHS' wearing worn-out gloves, the other 'EDAP' in shiny gear, square off as a disinterested British Bulldog acts as referee.
ideas.why_funny: Pits the established NHS against the presenting company in a comical showdown.

ideas.title: Pigeon Investor
ideas.premise: A pigeon, wearing a tiny bowler hat and holding a miniature newspaper, is perched on a conference attendee's shoulder, whispering investment advice about EDAP.
ideas.why_funny: Uses a common London pigeon to symbolize a shrewd, but absurd, investor.
